sentence.Network_en: I know you will join me in wishing them Godspeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 我知道你会同我一起祝愿他们诸事顺遂的。

sentence.Network_en: We bade / wished her godspeed , ie said farewell to her.
Godliman said, " He wishes you both good luck and Godspeed. "
sentence.Network_cn: “ 他祝你们吉星高照马到成功 ” 戈理曼说.

list.abs: They bade us godspeed on our journey ., 他们祝我们旅途平安.

entry.tran: （尤用作对即将进行长途艰险旅行的人的祝愿语）幸运，成功,(一路)平安
entry.def: The term Godspeed is sometimes used in order to wish someone success and safety, especially if they are about to go on a long and dangerous journey.

example.ex: I know you will join me in wishing them Godspeed.
example.tran: 我知道你会同我一起祝愿他们诸事顺遂的。

auth_sentence.content: With his wishes for Godspeed in my ears...I set off.

auth_sentence.content: "Godspeed to you and your forces," Obama told him.
